Key.name: USER_NAME
Key.desc: Username length must be less than 50.

Key.name: PASSWORD
Key.desc: Password length must be more than 6 and less than 50.

Key.name: volume_music
Key.desc: Music volume

Key.name: volume_ring
Key.desc: Notification volume

Key.name: volume_alarm
Key.desc: Alarm volume

Key.name: silent_mode
Key.desc: Silent mode 0-Silent 1-Vibrate 2-Normal

Key.name: ringtone
Key.desc: Phone ringtone

Key.name: notification_sound
Key.desc: notification sound

Key.name: vibrate_when_ringing
Key.desc: Vibrate when ring

Key.name: dtmf_tone
Key.desc: Dial pad touch tones

Key.name: sound_effects_enabled
Key.desc: Touch sounds

Key.name: lockscreen_sounds_enabled
Key.desc: Screen lock sound

Key.name: haptic_feedback_enabled
Key.desc: Vibrate on touch

Key.name: screen_brightness_mode
Key.desc: Adjust screen display brightness control, 1 for auto, 0 is default.

Key.name: screen_brightness
Key.desc: Adjust screen display brightness, form 30 to 255

Key.name: screen_off_timeout
Key.desc: Adjust the delay before the screen automatically turns off, 15000, 30000, 60000, 120000, 600000, 1800000, -1 (Nerver timeout)

Key.name: font_scale
Key.desc: Scaling factor for fonts, value are float. 0.85 = Small, 1.0 = Normal, 1.15 = Large, 1.3 = Huge

Key.name: accelerometer_rotation
Key.desc: Auto rotate screen, 0 or 1.

Key.name: keep_awake_on_motion_enabled_setting
Key.desc: Wake up device when motion is detected, 0 or 1.

Key.name: wake_up_on_motion_enabled_setting
Key.desc: Keep device on when motion is detected, 0 or 1.

Key.name: face_down_suspend_enabled_setting
Key.desc: Face down suspend, 0 or 1.

Key.name: White Apps Num
Key.desc: Total white apps number of this user, it must be right.

Key.name: STATUS
Key.desc: Whether auto run app, false or true.

Key.name: NETWORK_STATE
Key.desc: Allow application launch. 0-Always 1-When network connected 2-When active internet connection available

Key.name: _WifiNetwork
Key.desc: Enable or disable Wi-Fi network.

Key.name: _WifiSwitch
Key.desc: Enable or disable Wi-Fi ON/OFF Button for user.

Key.name: _Bluetooth
Key.desc: Enable or disable Bluetooth settings for user

Key.name: _ChangeProfile
Key.desc: Change profile permission.

Key.name: _Password
Key.desc: Change password permission.

Key.name: _MobileNetwork
Key.desc: Enable or disable mobile network.

Key.name: _SDCard
Key.desc: Enable or disable sdcard.

Key.name: _WifiSettings
Key.desc: Enable or disable Wi-Fi Settings for user.

Key.name: _AutoRun
Key.desc: Permission to auto run apps.

Key.name: _EzConfig
Key.desc: Permission to perform EZConfig barcode scan

Key.name: key_data_collection_enable
Key.desc: Collect Data from Launcher(Includes License and Config update events)

Key.name: key_user_events_enable
Key.desc: Collect User Events(Login,Logout,Invalid credentials)

Key.name: key_screen_events_enable
Key.desc: Collect Screen Events(Screen ON and OFF)

Key.name: key_show_maintenance_due_alerts
Key.desc: Show maintenance due alerts for users(Configurable for only perpetual license)

Key.name: key_show_preload_license_alerts
Key.desc: Show one year maintenance alerts for preloaded license

Key.name: key_show_license_outdated_alerts
Key.desc: Show license outdated alert for users

Key.name: key_show_license_validity_completed_alerts
Key.desc: Show license validity completed alert for users

Key.name: key_show_license_grace_period_alerts
Key.desc: Show license grace period alert for users

Key.name: key_show_alerts_for_admin
Key.desc: Show license alerts for admin(Independent of other license configurations)

Key.name: Allowed_Launcher_Packages
Key.desc: Allows mentioned Launcher packages inside Honeywell Launcher(Launcher package should be given as packagename,classname)(Separate by ; if there multiple entries).

Key.name: launcher_reset_after_config_update
Key.desc: Set Launcher to login screen after configuration update(If User Mode changes then preference will be true)

Key.name: key_remove_old_profiles
Key.desc: Remove the existing profiles

Key.name: Honeywell_Launcher_Status
Key.desc: Enable or disable Honeywell Launcher.

Key.name: pref_key_app_mode
Key.desc: Application Mode 0-Single Application Mode,1-Multiple Apllication Mode.

Key.name: pref_key_user_mode
Key.desc: User Mode 0-Single User Mode,1-Multiple User Mode.

Key.name: key_disable_airplane_mode
Key.desc: No airplane mode setting in power menu.

Key.name: pref_key_disable_volume_mode
Key.desc: Disable volume hard key

Key.name: key_dock_mode
Key.desc: Blanking only when docked

Key.name: key_voice_input
Key.desc: Disable voice input when in motion

Key.name: key_gps_errant_data_filter
Key.desc: Use some filter to filter out the GPS errant data

Key.name: key_enable_motion_speed
Key.desc: Enable Speed threshold

Key.name: key_disable_motion_speed
Key.desc: Disable Speed threshold

Key.name: key_speed_unit
Key.desc: Speed unit

Key.name: key_enable_motion_mode_time
Key.desc: Enable time threshold

Key.name: key_disable_motion_mode_time
Key.desc: Disable time threshold

Key.name: key_gps_lost_timer
Key.desc: GPS lost timer

Key.name: key_blanking_mode
Key.desc: Blanking mode

Key.name: key_logoff_timeout
Key.desc: Auto logoff timer( Range should be 0-500 )

Key.name: key_wifi_enable
Key.desc: Enable Wifi when user has wifi permission

Key.name: key_clear_lockscreen_pin
Key.desc: Provide the current Pin or Password to clear the lock screen.This will be applicable for Android P and above OS versions

Key.name: key_screen_lock_enable
Key.desc: Enable existing screen lock(Not supported on EDA70 devices)

Key.name: key_custom_lock_type
Key.desc: Custom Screen Lock Type(0-None 1-Pin 2-Password)

Key.name: key_custom_lock_pin_or_password
Key.desc: Custom Lock Pin or Password(Pin will allow only Numeric Inputs)

Key.name: key_mobile_data_enable
Key.desc: Enable the mobile data

Key.name: key_launcher_notificationbar_enable
Key.desc: Enable launcher Notificationbar for users

Key.name: cache_system_date_and_time
Key.desc: Enable launcher Notificationbar for users

Key.name: key_gboard_mode
Key.desc: Keep Gboard option in Soft keyboard

Key.name: key_default_input_method
Key.desc: Set default input method, e.g. com.android.hsm.sip/.SIPSoftKeyboard

Key.name: key_display_mode
Key.desc: Change Display Mode(applicable only for devices with software navigation bar) 0-Normal (default), 1-hide Navigation bar, 2-hide Status bar, 3-hide both (For Android 11 and above OS, 2-hiding status bar support is removed. If value set to 2 it will be considered as default value 0)

Key.name: key_nfc_mode
Key.desc: Configure NFC and Android Beam(0- Both OFF 1- NFC ON Beam OFF 2 - Both ON)

Key.name: App_Chooser_Activity_Enable
Key.desc: Enable or disable App Chooser Activity.

Key.name: key_enable_autorun_delay
Key.desc: Enable delay to autorun apps

Key.name: key_autorun_delay_time
Key.desc: Enter the delay in ms for autorun Apps
